title: Puscifer: Album October 30
excerpt: I’m sure not many people here have ever heard of Puscifer. I aim to change that. Puscifer (pronouned: pussy-fur) is a new side project of Tool’s front man, Maynard James Keenan. Maybe you have heard a couple of songs without realizing it. The only two songs officially released from the project on an album are … more →
